on reading compounds: 蹲踞【ソンキョ】crouching, formal crouch performed at the beginning of a sumo or kendo match
蟠踞【バンキョ】becoming firmly established, putting down strong roots, exercising authority, being dominant, holding sway, settling in a coiled shape
屈む【カガム】to stoop, to lean over, to bend forward, to bend down, to crouch, to squat
kun reading compounds: 蹲る【うずくまる】to crouch, to squat, to cower
